body.p: During its deliberations, the Board considered specifying that an entity applies the requirements in paragraph 99 on a plan-by-plan basis (and not, for example, on a country-by-country basis or an entity-by-entity basis). The Board decided against this approach because paragraph 57 already states that an entity accounts separately for each material defined benefit plan.
